title: Renewable energy top priority, Rs 30 lakh crore investment expected to meet 500 GW target: Govt
description: Union minister Pralhad Joshi announced in Rajya Sabha that an investment of Rs 30 lakh crore is anticipated for India to achieve 500 GW renewable energy capacity by 2030. He emphasized the government's commitment by citing increased budget allocations and significant progress in recent years. Opposition members questioned the feasibility of these ambitious targets.
